invocations.description: Switches to profile profilename. Possible values for profiletype are 'targeting', 'looting' and 'supplies'.
invocations.ex:
if $voc == VOC_KNIGHT then
	switchprofile('knight', 'targeting')
else
	switchprofile('all', 'targeting')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will switch to targeting profile named 'knight' if the current character's vocation is knight; else, will switch to profile 'all'.
